body: @peteraritchie Can you run `dotnet ef migrations add Two --startup-project Api --project Infrastructure` or similar immediately after adding the first migration? If the Up and Down methods in the second migration are not empty, can you post the contents here?
@ajcvickers Probably not a surprise to you, but a subsequent `dotnet ef migrations add Three --startup-project Api --project Infrastructure` resulted in the same Up and Down methods as Two.
@peteraritchie Thanks for testing this--it confirms this is a bug in EF8/EF9. I will let @AndriySvyryd decide if he needs more info.

> [@peteraritchie](https://github.com/peteraritchie) Thanks for testing this--it confirms this is a bug in EF8/EF9. I will let [@AndriySvyryd](https://github.com/AndriySvyryd) decide if he needs more info.

Let me know if there's anything you need @AndriySvyryd
@alraseensaad Can you create a small repro and open a new issue? You seem to be hitting a different issue
@pastrasigns Do you still get it after adding a new migration?
